dmca.title: Trademark Complaint to Google: Android Market
dmca.body:
Google Form: Android Market Trademark Complaint

1. Complainant's Information
Name: [redacted]
Your Title: IP Administrator



Company name: Vonage Marketing LLC
Address: [redacted]
Country: US

2. Trademark at issue:
What is the trademark?

VONAGE word mark and V & Dot Logo (shown in web developer's app
icon)

In which country/countries is this trademark registered? 

VONAGE is registered in US, Canada, Australia, European
Community (CTM), Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, International Register,
Japan, Malaysia, Mexico, New Zealand, Norway, Philippines, Peru, Singapore,
S. Korea, Taiwan, Thailand, and Vietnam.

V & Dot Logo is registered in US, Canada, European Community (CTM), and
Mexico.

If applicable, please provide the registration number of the trademark at issue:
VONAGE Registrations:
US - Registration #2,614,773
Australia - Registration #989273 & #1060954
Canada - Registration #TMA631045
China - Registration #4740563
European Community (Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic,
Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland,
Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland,
Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and United Kingdom)
Registration #003056397
Hong Kong - Registration #300448515 India - Registration #630800
Indonesia - Registration #IDM000111779 & IDM000111773
Japan - Registration #4934039
Malaysia - Registration #05010571 & 05010572
Mexico - Registration #838134
New Zealand - Registration #731533
Norway - Registration #201105552
Philippines - Registration #4-2011-007188
Peru - Registration #00002747
Singapore - Registration #T0511856Z &
IR851897 & T0511062C
S. Korea - Registration #673776, 131465 & IR851897
Taiwan - Registration #1227564 Thailand - Registration #Bor29334 &
Kor249864
Vietnam - Registration #85041

V & Dot Logo -
US Registration - #3,681,594
Canada - Registration #TMA727245
EU - CTM - Registration #005283544
Mexico - Registration #1202786 & 1207654

3. Allegedly Infringing Material:
Location of infringing material:




4. Legal Affirmations: Please check if you agree with the following statements.
IMPORTANT: Please note that we cannot investigate your complaint if you do not check both boxes.

I have a good faith belief that use of the trademarks described above in the Android Market application described above are not authorized by the trademark owner or its agent, nor is such use otherwise permissible under law:
[checked]
I represent that the information in this notification is true and correct and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the trademark owner:
[checked]

Signed on this date of: 
2012-1-16

Signature
[Private]
